Dear Sir or Madam:

Necon GmbH is a global manufacture of water treatment industry in Germany. Our main products are water treatments for providing abacterial water for swimming pool, hospital, school, kitchen,cooling, dentistry, plant,feeding , agriculture, leisure and recreation etc. Whereever you need the abacterial water, Necon products is helpful.

  1. Our treatment is real chemical-free water disinfection system. Thus it is safe for humans and for the environment.
  2. Disinfection is rapid, effect is long-lasting. Ions that are released by the electrode remain in the water. They prevent growth of new bacteria and fungi. regardless of climatic conditions Result: The water and the pipes etc stay protected for long time!

NECON Water Safety: robust, effective, safe and durable treatment. We have all the professional laboratory test and certification from the Government.

Hope our email does not bring trouble to you. Any needs please feel free to let us know.

Rgs, Alice Yuan alice@necon.de
